verses.verse: Then <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and her <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6989>Keturah<s%>.
And she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H2175>Zimran<s%>, and <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%>, and <S%H4091>Medan<s%>, and <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and <S%H3435>Ishbak<s%>, and <S%H7744>Shuah<s%>.

And <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>, and <S%H1719>Dedan<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were <S%H805>Asshurim<s%>, and <S%H3912>Letushim<s%>, and <S%H3817>Leummim<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>; <S%H5891>Ephah<s%>, and <S%H6081>Epher<s%>, and <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%>, and <S%H28>Abida<s%>, and <S%H420>Eldaah<s%>. All these were the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> all that he had unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

But unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H85>had<s%>, Abraham <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, and sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> from <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, while he yet <S%H2416>lived<s%>, <S%H6924>eastward<s%>, unto the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.

And these are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H2416>life<s%> which he <S%H2425>lived<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> sixty and <S%H7657>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age<s%>, an old <S%H2205>man<s%>, and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H622>years<s%>; and was gathered to his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>;

The <S%H7704>field<s%> which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>: there was <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%>, and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>; and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> the well <S%H883>Lahai<s%>–roi.

Now these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, whom <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>:

And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, by their <S%H8034>names<s%>, according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%>: the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, <S%H5032>Nebajoth<s%>; and <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, and <S%H110>Adbeel<s%>, and <S%H4017>Mibsam<s%>,
And <S%H4927>Mishma<s%>, and <S%H1746>Dumah<s%>, and <S%H4854>Massa<s%>,
<S%H2316>Hadar<s%>, and <S%H8485>Tema<s%>, <S%H3195>Jetur<s%>, <S%H5305>Naphish<s%>, and <S%H6929>Kedemah<s%>:

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and these are their <S%H8034>names<s%>, by their <S%H2691>towns<s%>, and by their <S%H2918>castles<s%>; <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to their <S%H523>nations<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%>; and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And they <S%H7931>lived<s%> from <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> unto <S%H7793>Shur<s%>, that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: and he <S%H5307>died<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of all his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.
And these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>: <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>:

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> of <S%H6307>Padan<s%>–aram, the <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5227>for<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, because she was <S%H6135>childless<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of <S%H7259>him<s%>, and Rebekah his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> struggled <S%H7533>together<s%> within <S%H7130>her<s%>; and she <S%H559>said<s%>, If it be <S%H2088>so<s%>, why am I thus? And she <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8147>her<s%>, Two <S%H1471>nations<s%> are in your <S%H990>womb<s%>, and two <S%H8147>manner<s%> of <S%H3816>people<s%> shall be <S%H6504>separated<s%> from your <S%H4578>body<s%>; and the one <S%H3816>people<s%> shall be <S%H553>stronger<s%> than the other <S%H3816>people<s%>; and the <S%H7227>elder<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H6810>younger<s%>.
And when her <S%H3117>days<s%> to be <S%H3205>delivered<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, <S%H8380>behold<s%>, there were twins in her <S%H990>womb<s%>.
And the <S%H7223>first<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H132>red<s%>, all over like an <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>garment<s%>; and they <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H3318>came<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> took <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H6119>heel<s%>; and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when she gave birth to <S%H3205>them<s%>.

And the <S%H5288>boys<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%>: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was a <S%H3045>cunning<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was a <S%H8535>plain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%>.
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, because he did <S%H6310>eat<s%> of his <S%H6718>venison<s%>: but <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2102>boiled<s%> <S%H5138>stew<s%>: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and he was <S%H5889>faint<s%>:

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3938>Feed<s%> <S%H4480>me<s%>, I pray you with that <S%H122>same<s%> <S%H122>red<s%> stew for I am <S%H5889>faint<s%>: therefore was his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4376>Sell<s%> me this <S%H3117>day<s%> your <S%H1062>birthright<s%>.
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1980>Behold<s%>, I am at the point to <S%H4191>die<s%>: and what profit shall this birthright do to <S%H1062>me<s%>?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7650>Swear<s%> to me this <S%H3117>day<s%>; and he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H4376>him<s%>: and he sold his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H5138>stew<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils<s%>; and he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and went his <S%H3212>way<s%>: thus <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H959>despised<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%>.
